aboutApp:
Hyderabad Traffic Police Mobile application is a bridge between

Hyderabad Traffic Police and traffic commuters for getting

immediate information. Main aim of Hyderabad Traffic Police is

commuters to have traffic police information on their hands,

with this HTP mobile application commuters or users can

easily get the information about local traffic police

station address with concern officer contact no.s,

to know traffic rules and regulations, road safety tips,

emergency contact information, traffic violation fines,

vehicle chalk an status, auto fare, etc.,

Moreover mobile users can see live traffic view.
